item.description:
Due to popular demand… ;-)



We will be having a pick up ride on Saturday.



We’ll be heading to the Nessralla Farm in Halifax for their Corn Maze.



http://www.nessrallaf...





It’s $8 for the maze, but print out the coupon on the website and save a dollar!!!





We will of course take the long way to the corn maze and enjoy the roads in the area.





This will not be a long day for Cindy and I as we have an early evening family commitment.

If you are interested…


Meet at 10:00 am Ride to leave at 10:30 am

Meeting spot… (It’s a new one!)



Dunkin Donuts off Rte 3, Exit 9.

If your coming from the north, heading South take a left at end of exit.



Address is…136 Main St, Kingston, MA

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Corn Maze -Pick up ride
